name: Floating Struggle
description:
First Game Jam Project

Story

You are a cat and you had a wonderful day on the beach in a big rubber ring, floating in the ocean and drinking juice. Now it is getting late and you want to get back on the beach. There are many other cats in big rubber rings enyoing there social distance swimming time.  And there is no space for you to move back on your own and it’s still covid and you don't want to get sick.

Note

➔ control just by left klick 
➔ if the game doesn't work in your browser try another one. I recommend Chrome :)

this game was created just by me in one week during a college course and this is an early release. I’ll update the game with final illustrations and less bugs in the next days and weeks :) 

_______________

by Willze
